archimate:Requirement.name: NC.2.1.1g: g) details of any monitoring activities to be performed (e.g. scanning the content of messages and attachments) to detect malicious activity and accidental leakage of information.
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
